artist: Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.; Designer: Paul Gedeohn
description: Water color type, actual size iris garden. Blue with peach and green Blue Dusk
dimension: overall (Not trimmed): 16 1/4 x 56 in. (41.28 x 142.24 cm)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Paul Gedeohn
text:
Of all Larsen designs, this is the most painterly in its effect.  Paul Gedeohn's
 inspiration for the original watercolor were photographs that Jack Larsen had taken
 of a famous European iris garden. The watercolor effect of the fabric is a tour de
 force of print technology that is enhanced by the weave and finish of the ground cloth.
title: Winter Iris
